description: Official upstream development repository for Cabal and cabal-install
name: cabal

description: Fast, portable and reliable dependency analysis for any codebase. Supports license & vulnerability scanning for large monoliths. Language-agnostic; integrates with 20+ build systems.
name: fossa-cli

description: Implementation of the Hydra Head protocol
name: hydra

description: A shell script which checks your $HOME for unwanted files and directories.
name: xdg-ninja

description: The core of xmonad, a small but functional ICCCM-compliant tiling window manager
name: xmonad

description: Official haskell ide support via language server (LSP). Successor of ghcide & haskell-ide-engine.
name: haskell-language-server

description: The official (but not yet stable) formatter for Nix code
name: nixfmt

description: Parsing, analyzing, and comparing source code across many languages
name: semantic

description: Dockerfile linter, validate inline bash, written in Haskell
name: hadolint

description: REST API for any Postgres database
name: postgrest

description: The core component that is used to participate in a Cardano decentralised blockchain.
name: cardano-node

description: Toolkit for converting and building songs for Rock Band, Guitar Hero, Clone Hero, and other similar rhythm games
